about.details:
Incorporated in 2009, Manomay Tex India Ltd (MTIL) is primarily engaged into manufacturing and sale of denim fabrics in domestic and international markets under "Manomay" brand. The denim manufactured by the company ranges from 9 to 14 Oz/Sq Yd with different blends of cotton, polyester etc. with foam and wet finish.

They are also focusing on suiting fabrics of different qualities as per the market demand. MTIL has recently ventured into international markets and at present their customer base is spread over different regions in India as well as in countries like Guatamela and Mexico.

faqs.question: What is the Manomay Tex India IPO?
faqs.answer:
Manomay Tex India IPO is a SME IPO of 3804000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹11.41 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on March 15, 2017, and closes on March 20, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Manomay Tex India IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Manomay Tex India IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Manomay Tex India IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Manomay Tex India IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Manomay Tex India IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.answer: You can apply in Manomay Tex India IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account.
